body: Herro, So ill make it short. When i started Avicus my favorite map was Fantasy. I started to dislike it once it was changed with special buffs and eventually diamondpvp. But i was wondering if we can get the Origanal Fantasy map back in the rot. Thanks :P

title: Bring back Fantasy
